title: Strangeness on a fresh install of client

replies.body: Holy wall of text!  It looks like your repair tool was trying to fix bad files.  Did it work?  If the issue still persists, you may want to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and reinstall the game from scratch.  The steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide should help as well by making sure your repair and installation files are allowed to update.  If there's no permission, then your game files won't be able to install correctly.  I hope that helps!
